DOC.brief_summary: Aim of the study is to define if the auditory stimulation during stepping verticalization sessions with "Erigo" is able to modify the cerebral electric activity or improve consciousness in patients affected by vegetative state or minimally conscious state.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Auditory Stimulation During Verticalization With Erigo in Patients With Disorder of Consciousness
DOC.criteria: Vegetative State or Minimally Conscious State diagnosis >3 months from acute brain injury No clinical stability Sepsis Orthopaedic contraindications for verticalization Deep Vein Thrombosis weight >130 Kg height >210 cm
